sentences.en: Although he pretended to sympathise, I knew he was laughing up his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 虽然他装作同情, 但我知道他心里暗暗地高兴.

sentences.en: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.
sentences.cn: 任何人都能对朋友的不幸感到同情，但要消受一个春风得意的朋友，则需要非常优良的天性。

sentences.en: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.
sentences.cn: 同情一个朋友的苦难是任何人都能做到的，但同情一个朋友的成功则需要具有十分出色的素质。—— 王尔德。

sentences.en: Anyone who has been in a troubled relationship will sympathise with Sue.
sentences.cn: 那些曾经恋爱不顺利的人都会同情休。

sentences.en: As it happens, I sympathise with the impatience.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 我对这种不耐烦情绪颇有同感.

sentences.en: But I also sympathise with the difficulties of the caf é owner.
sentences.cn: 但我也同情那家咖啡店店主的难处.

sentences.en: He didn't sympathise with the corporations, but strength was with them.
sentences.cn: "他并不同情公司, 但是力量属于他们.

sentences.en: I can sympathise with Chelsea's board and manager and the people running Chelsea.
sentences.cn: 现在,我对切尔西委员会和教练,以及那个维持切尔西运转的人都抱着莫大的同情.

sentences.en: If they want national freedom, of course we sympathise.
sentences.cn: 如果他们要求民族自由, 我们当然是同情的.

sentences.en: It made clear to Carrie that he could not sympathise with her.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉马上看清他无法理解她的感情,给她以同情.

sentences.en: Many people might sympathise with those driven to commit this particular form of homicide.
sentences.cn: 很多人可能会同情那些被迫做了这种特殊形式杀人的犯罪者.
